permissions: Admin users can update customer retainers. Non-admin users can update when they have a broker membership matching seller_id or a customer membership matching buyer_id.
side_effects: Updates a customer retainer record; when status becomes active, the server schedules an expiration update job.
validation_notes: At least one field must be provided; --customer and --broker cannot be empty when provided; status must be one of editing, active, terminated, expired, closed; terminated-on must be YYYY-MM-DD and must be present when status is terminated; terminated-on must be before the last retainer period end date; maximum-travel-minutes and billable-travel-minutes-per-travel-mile must be >= 0; status cannot be changed to editing from another status; status can only be expired when term_end_on is in the past; buyer must be a Customer and seller must be a Broker.

flags.name: --terminated-on
flags.validation: YYYY-MM-DD; required when status is terminated

flags.name: --billable-travel-minutes-per-travel-mile
flags.description: Billable travel minutes per travel mile
